Interface IReviewService

public interface IReviewService
The interface for review services.

  • Method Details

    • getReviewsForUser

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ReviewDTO> getReviewsForUser(String handle, Integer pageNumber, Integer pageSize) throws AppException
      Retrieves reviews for a user with pagination.
      Parameters:
      handle - the user handle
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      Returns:
      a Page object containing ReviewDTOs
      Throws:
      AppException - if there is an error retrieving the reviews

    • getReviewsForProduct

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<ReviewDTO> getReviewsForProduct(Integer id, Integer pageNumber, Integer pageSize) throws AppException
      Retrieves reviews for a product with pagination.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the product
      pageNumber - the page number
      pageSize - the page size
      Returns:
      a Page object containing ReviewDTOs
      Throws:
      AppException - if there is an error retrieving the reviews

    • getReview

      ReviewDTO getReview(String handle, Integer productId) throws AppException
      Retrieves a review for a user and a product.
      Parameters:
      handle - the user handle
      productId - the ID of the product
      Returns:
      the ReviewDTO object
      Throws:
      AppException - if there is an error retrieving the review

    • createReview

      void createReview(ReviewDTO reviewDTO) throws AppException
      Creates a new review.
      Parameters:
      reviewDTO - the ReviewDTO object containing the details of the review
      Throws:
      AppException - if there is an error creating the review

    • updateReview

      void updateReview(String handle, Integer productId, ReviewDTO reviewDTO) throws AppException
      Updates a review for a user and a product.
      Parameters:
      handle - the user handle
      productId - the ID of the product
      reviewDTO - the ReviewDTO object containing the updated details
      Throws:
      AppException - if there is an error updating the review

    • deleteReview
